# Invasion (2017 film)

| runtime        = 90 minutes
| country        = Iran
| language       = Persian
| budget         =
}}
Invasion () is a 2017 Iranian crime film directed by Shahram Mokri. It was screened in the Panorama section at the 68th Berlin International Film Festival.
Cast
* Babak Karimi
* Abed Abest
* Levon Haftvan
* Pedram Sharifi
